projects.title: Ship Flooding Physics Simulation
projects.about: This project was made for my final year project at university. The goal was to create a 3D physics simulation which could be used to determine whether certain configurations of ship bulkheads are safer than others. Specifically, whether longitudinal bulkheads are safe to use on ships. The graphics are made using OpenGL.

projects.title: OpenGL Engine
projects.about: This engine was created to have a quick and easy setup for an OpenGL context as well as being able to quickly render primitives and custom shaders using GLSL. The engine currently has user input such as mouse movement and keyboard presses as well as a camera which can be controlled. The image for this is the Mandelbrot set as well as the corresponding Julia set and a particular location depending on mouse coordinates.

projects.title: Pixel Planetary Simulation
projects.about: This project is a remake of my Java 2D planetary orbit simulator using C++ and the olcPixelGameEngine. It features force applied physics to simulate gravitational pull between bodies. The planets can be displayed with their trails showing previous positions and velocity vectors. The camera uses WASD to move and it can also be locked to a body.

projects.title: Pixel Spring Physics Simulation
projects.about: This project is a 2D pixel simulation of spring connections between nodes. The original goal was to simulate rope, which was achieved by connecting many nodes closely together. Properties such as tension and stretching can be shown. Furthermore, if a few nodes are connected it also simulates soft-body physics.

projects.title: OpenGL Racing Game
projects.about: This project was coursework for my 3D Graphics OpenGL module in my third year. We had to create a racing game which includes multiple primitives, 3D model imports, programatically generated tracks, multiple lights as well as instanced rendering and post-processing.

projects.title: Pixel Mandelbrot
projects.about: This is a project made using the OCLPixelGameEngine by Javid which shows the mandelbrot set.

projects.title: Pixel Ray Marching
projects.about: This is a project made using the OCLPixelGameEngine by Javid which shows a pixel ray marching renderer.

projects.title: Garage Management System
projects.about: This project was created for a team project in my second year of university. The software is a management system for a garage which includes features for users such as a receptionist and a mechanic. The receptionist can take jobs and the mechanic can work on the job. There are other featuers such as automatic invoice generation as well as automatic stock renewal. I did the main programming work for this project.

projects.title: 2D planetary Orbit Simulator
projects.about: The project was creating in the summer of 2018. I created a custom physics engine to simulate gravity. Planet data was recorded to try and get an accurate simulation

projects.title: 2D platformer game
projects.about: This project was coursework for my Java course in my first year of university. It uses Java, Swing and JBox2D.

projects.title: 2D Puzzle
projects.about: Recreation of a puzzle from 'Puzzle Agent 2' made in Java.

projects.title: Map Simulation Test
projects.about: A test of a historical political map from 800ad, the user can click on towns to change the map.

projects.title: Boolean Algebra Converter
projects.about: This project is my A-Level coursework. The user can input Boolean Algebra, the software can convert this to a truth table and/or a logic circuit.
